# **Environmental Site Assessment Services**
## **Tender Announcement**
### **Reference:** PW-22-01011219
#### **Publication Date:** 2022-10-25
#### **Tender Closing Date:** 2022-12-15T13:00:00
#### **Amendment Number:** 2
* **Services Required:** Environmental Site Assessment Services for the Pacific Region
* **Services Description:** Real Property Safety and Security conducts site assessments, characterizations, and environmental compliance audits on properties owned or of interest to Fisheries and Oceans Canada.
* **This Standing Offer requires services for Hazardous Building Materials Assessments and Control Management Plans, Indoor Environmental Quality Sampling, and other occupational health and safety and environmental risk expertise and consulting services in the Pacific Region.**
* **Project Scope:**
	+ Hazardous Building Materials Assessments and Control Management Plans
	+ Indoor Environmental Quality Sampling
	+ Potable Water Risk Assessments and Control Management Plans
	+ Other occupational health and safety and environmental risk expertise and consulting services
* **Contract Duration:** November 2022 to November 2024, with an option to extend for two (2) additional one (1) year periods.
* **Comprehensive Land Claims Agreements:** The project is subject to the Comprehensive Land Claims Agreements areas across Canada.
* **Trade Agreements:**
	+ World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO-AGP)
	+ Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
	+ Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
	+ Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
	+ Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
	+ Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Contractor Requirements:**
	+ Trade Agreement Compliance
	+ Security Clearance (Required)
	+ Conflicts of Interest (Must meet eligibility criteria)
	+ Contract Termination (Waiver)
	+ Taxes (Applicable as per the governing TPSA law)
* **Bid Documents:**
	+ Documents in French and English
	+ [Attachment link 1: Solicitation Addendum 1](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/10/25/f8da20f19d52cd4cde
